name: Utter Confusion
description:
An intensly mind melting experience.

Utter Confusion tasks you with fighting against endless waves of psychedelic enemies as the camera spins and pulsates. Defeating an enemy releases an explosion of confetti which must be collected. How long can you withstand the spinning?

The preview version is now available absolutley free!

The full version will feature:

  • Online Highscores
  • A plethora of challenge modes to mix up the gameplay
  • A custom game mode designer that lets you mess with almost every variable in the game.
